author: David LeVene
comment: I use this app a lot for storing the reward cards, but when trying to open to scan it just takes too long and i don't bother. It seems if I'm in a low signal areas it take even longer. Would be good if i could create shortcuts to open a reward card directly and have it happen in a timely manner.

author: Mark Haury
comment: Adding new cards leaves a lot to be desired. Can't edit manually entered barcode number, have to completely delete card and start over. Photos are *WAY* off center from the viewfinder mask and there's no way to crop or correct - have to guess and compensate manually, takes many tries. Apparently very limited barcode standard support - won't scan originals and result looks nothing like original.

author: Joshua Ferguson
comment: Update: App updated, still can't log into my account. Emailed numerous times, takes ages for a response and still no fix   Trying to log in after a "merge" and being locked out. Now I get constant network connectivity errors. Had no access to the app and my account for weeks now.

author: Van Duong
comment: This would be better if the rewards cards are on one simple page instead of scrolling all theway to the right Eg: make it so the boxes are all smaller and viewable in one go for less scrolling. Having over 20 rewards cards and scrolling all the way to the right is not convenient

author: Kristy Goodrick
comment: I love having all my rewsrd cards in one place. I hope they release a map with all the place rewardle can be used soon. And what is this ribbons thing?

author: 美女狼 与
comment: While registration it asks to confirm the acc trough the phone number , and the thing is I can't change the county to put my number there. Maybe its another bug

author: Jason Bellinger
comment: Good app. But don't understand why you can't search for local reward places??

author: James Gordon
comment: There is no way to change email addresses once an account is created. Rediculous.

author: Holly Walsh
comment: Card scanning function does not work

author: Eric Melman
comment: Worst app all it does is try get information from you.

author: Wardog _
comment: Standard rewards app but with how frequently stores' tablets don't update the server it really needs a "my points haven't updated" button for each location. Sick of calling support to prompt them to contact the store and fix their connectivity.

author: Richard Wong
comment: Strange that the prepaid doesn't apply to everywhere you go & scanning doesn't take it off the prepaid

author: Rebecca Burfitt
comment: Great for getting rewards at my favorite coffee places. Would be nicer if I could search for local places that have rewardle.

author: Jerome Ching
comment: Self check out cant Scan the app even on full brightness

author: Alex T
comment: Updated this review as location services no longer a requirement. Good rewards system. Only use it for the QR code.

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Alex!

Thank you for your feedback! We will be removing the location services requirement in our next release of the Rewardle App. Please let us know if we can assist you with anything else! 

Rewardle Support

author: Phillip Horton
comment: A good app for flybuys card and others.

author: Raúl Beristáin
comment: The new version keeps begging for a location permission even though I explicitly marked it as never ask again. Guess what? I don't want you to ever ask again, get a hint.  I do love the Wear widget!

author: Phlan-Michelle Purss
comment: There's no way to be to find merchants that accepts the card and I am not sure if I'm ever going back to the that I was at today as I don't to that part of town very much. Sorry but after today I may not ever use this thing ever again.

author: Axel Sewell
comment: Persistent "communication error" dialogue, unable to login. Device connectivity not an issue.

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Axel,

Thanks for getting in touch

We are sorry about that! We had a temporary server outage - everything is running as normal now! Can you please try signing in again?

- Rewardle Support Team

author: Andrew Casey
comment: The app takes so long to start I replaced it by taking a screenshot of the QR code

author: Kiseok Kim
comment: Quick response from staff

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Kiseok!

Thanks for getting in touch

We are sorry about that! We had a temporary server outage - everything is running as normal now! Can you please try signing in again?

- Rewardle Support Team

author: Kristy Taylor
comment: Really needs a better way to have cards set up on there, so you dont have to scroll through all your cards to find the one you need its very annoying standing at a check out holding people up while you scroll through to find the card you need...grrrr please fix asap with a better system...

author: Jens Dyrssen
comment: Wanted to add my coffee shops rewards card and this app couldn't read the QR code.  Had to type in all those tiny characters manualy...

author: Ben Bradey
comment: To much clicking for what replaced a punch card. And why do you keep adding for my details on the store system? it's in the app

author: Stuart Macdonald
comment: A quick access option for regular use reward cards would be good, a widget or shortcut perhaps. Otherwise does what it should.

author: Sebastian Harper
comment: Too hard to add a card and use often. You end up missing points often. Not worth the effort.

author: Allyana Goff
comment: Good improvement with adding other cards. Would like to access how many points ive gathered in my rewards cards like flybys and woolworths. Also please add Boost and Cinebuzz rewards in the card selection

author: Pria Adam Mützelburg
comment: Love the app and keyring, just a bit laggy to load in a busy cafe line

author: Sarah Macdonald
comment: So nice to be able to use all my cards without lugging a fat wallet around

author: Tim Curtin
comment: No more fuel voucher adds.

author: corey Budden
comment: It's at a lot of places.

author: Adrian Welch
comment: Works well
Awesome

author: Heidi Ross
comment: The Rewardle section of this app is great, letting me track how many points I have and where. And I'm also glad it's upgraded to store other rewards cards. However, the interface for this part is not easy to use: when adding a new card the list is huge and can't be searched so requires scrolling through the list, and once added they don't automatically sort (e.g. Alphabetically), can't be searched, and are really big so takes time to shuffle through. Finally, the barcode scanner has a lot of trouble focussing on the card if not flat on a surface, so most of the time I have to enter manually. Otherwise, I like that I can empty my wallet of cards.

author: Matthew Colliver
comment: Finding that v4.2.9 is staying active, and using > 10% CPU...  Draining battery. Otherwise - fine.

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Matthew,

Can you please contact us at support@rewardle.com and we will do our best to help you from there!

- The Support Team

author: Abhilash Vadlamudi
comment: Would be great if you could provide release notes like everyone else.

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Abhilash,

Whoops! It looks like we made a mistake - we will make sure to add release notes in the future. Thank you for alerting us!

- The Support Team

author: Michael Spencer
comment: Causing Major battery drain on current version on Google Pixel XL

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Michael,

Could you please contact us at support@rewardle.com and we will do our best to help you from there!

- The Support Team

author: Daniel Wood
comment: App works, although slow to load, and often chews battery in the background.

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Daniel,

Can you contact us at support@rewardle.com? We will do our best to help you from there!

-The Support Team

author: Brendan Backhaus
comment: It's a good app. Could need more partners to team up with since I only visit Mobil sometimes and having a map showing where Rewardle is available could help people find places much easier.  Edit: So no map feature then? Too bad. I really wanted it instead of emailing. Rating drop to 4.

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Brendan!

If you would like to find out some businesses around your area that use Rewardle feel free to contact us at support@rewardle.com and we will give you some to get you started!

Cheers,

The Support Team

author: Sam Mancuso
comment: Upon opening the the QR code is only partially visible in order to display the advertisement in its entirety.   You have to move the QR code before you can scan it.  This annoyance was fixed in previous versions, but now they've reverted back to it.  Fix this issue and keep it fixed and I'll update my rating!

reply.author: Rewardle Pty Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Sam,

This should be fixed in the new versions! If you are still experiencing the issue please email us support@rewardle.com and we will be able to help you from there!

- The Support Team
